alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 7:30AM CST until December 27 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation with a combination of light snow and light freezing drizzle. Additional snow accumulations from only a dusting up to perhaps 1 to 2 inches in a few spots. Ice accumulations of a light glaze. North-northwest winds only 10 to 20 MPH in most areas, but higher gusts up to around 30 MPH mainly in western counties along and west of Highway 183 through this afternoon. * WHERE...Portions of north central Kansas and central and south central Nebraska, including the Tri Cities. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday and early Wednesday morning commutes.
info.instruction: Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith
